original_text: And there came also Nicodemus, which at the first came to Jesus by night, and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about an hundred pound weight.
korean_text: 일찍이 예수께 밤에 찾아왔던 니고데모도 몰약과 침향 섞은 것을 백 리트라쯤 가지고 온지라

sentences.original_text: which at the first came to Jesus by night
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 처음에 밤에 예수께 왔었던 자라

sentences.original_text: and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes
